ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: A framework to create Bootstrap <http://getbootstrap.com/> HTML reports from 'knitr' 'rmarkdown'.
A framework to create Bootstrap <http://getbootstrap.com/> HTML reports from 'knitr' 'rmarkdown'.

name: r-knitrbootstrap
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.0.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-knitrbootstrap
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/knitrBootstrap_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/knitrBootstrap/knitrBootstrap_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fbc1e8df2f9b17139d1156a17b890f3a50d356701862227981535ca50a21838a

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-knitr >=1.5.25
    - r-markdown
    - r-rmarkdown
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-knitr >=1.5.25
    - r-markdown
    - r-rmarkdown

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('knitrBootstrap')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('knitrBootstrap')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/jimhester/knitrBootstrap#readme
  license: MIT
  summary: A framework to create Bootstrap <http://getbootstrap.com/> HTML reports from 'knitr' 'rmarkdown'.
  license_family: MIT

  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE
extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: knitrBootstrap
# Version: 1.0.2
# Maintainer: Jim Hester <james.f.hester@gmail.com>
# Author: Jim Hester
# Title: 'knitr' Bootstrap Framework
# Description: A framework to create Bootstrap <http://getbootstrap.com/> HTML reports from 'knitr' 'rmarkdown'.
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0)
# Imports: knitr (>= 1.5.25), rmarkdown, markdown
# Suggests: testthat, roxygen2, corrplot, ggplot2, igraph, maps, mapproj, maptools, plyr, reshape2, xtable
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# URL: https://github.com/jimhester/knitrBootstrap#readme
# BugReports: https://github.com/jimhester/knitrBootstrap/issues
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# RoxygenNote: 6.0.1
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2018-05-24 18:09:05 UTC; jhester
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-05-24 18:20:07 UTC
